name: Light Ranger
description: This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam! The theme for this game jam was Light. In Light Ranger, your goal is to kill the most enemies before you die. The main mechanic of this game is shooting a light bullet where the light around the bullet will damage the enemy, however the actual bullet will strengthen the player. For more details on controls go to the How to Play menu in game. I worked on this game solo.
